description:
doc: add a FAQ entry about nil interfaces vs nil values in interfaces.

Fixes issue 2778.

messages.text:
Thanks for writing this. The FAQ entries have a particular style that I'd like to maintain, and your text doesn't really fit. There's also too much code, and I'd like to avoid code wherever possible in the FAQ to keep the answers short and easy for non-experts.

So, if you don't mind, I'd rather you left this to me. I promise to write something soon.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com, remy@archlinux.org),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

subject: code review 5673072: doc: add a FAQ entry about nil interfaces vs nil values...
